src:
Himki se oporavio od Zvezde, pa sasuo 109 poena Uniksu
Aleksej Šved ponovo pronašao staru šutersku formu

03 Nov 2019

Užasno je Himki odigrao prethodnog četvrtka u Beogradu, za tri četvrtine postigao svega 55 poena, a primio čak 80, ali je već ove nedelje uspeo da se trgne u velikom derbiju regionalne VTB lige. U glavnom gradu Rusije gostovao je Uniks iz Kazanja, koji je mogao da digne ruke od pobede već nakon prve četvrtine - 109:83.
Očajno je igrao Uniks u odbrani tokom čitavog meča, u svakoj od četvrtina primio je bar 26 poena, što je katastrofalno za tim koji planira da se bori za plasman u Evroligu naredne sezone. Napad je čak i funkcionisao sasvim solidno, sem u prvoj četvrtini.
Već u prvoj četvrtini, Himki je postepeno počeo da gradi prednost. Nisu to bile neke preterano velike serije poena, ali su bile sasvim dovoljne da domaćin već na kraju kvartala ima čak 13 poena prednosti. Međutim, na početku druge deonice viđen je potpuni krah gostiju.
Himki je vezao još 14 poena, otišao na neverovatnih 27 poena prednosti i to je bio put bez povratka za ekipu Uniksa, koja je, doduše do poluvremena uspela da umanji katastrofu, jer je smanjila zaostatak na 17 poena - 57:40.
Međutim, kao preslikan je bio početak trećeg kvartala. Himki je ponovo ušao u odličnu seriju, otišao još jednom na 27 poena razlike, a prednost je uspešno čuvao do samog kraja. Najveća razlika na semaforu viđena je sredinom poslednjeg kvartala, kada je bilo 30 poena između dva tima. Na kraju, „pristojnih“ minus 26 za Uniks - 109:83.
Bitno je istaći da je nakon pauze zbog povrede, ponovo zaigrao i Stefan Jović, koji je za osam minuta provedenih na terenu uspeo da upiše tri poena.
Najefikasniji kod Himkija očekivano je bio Aleksej Šved sa 24 poena, a ispratio ga je Devin Buker sa 21 poenom. Sa druge strane, Uniks je mogao da se osloni jedino na Smita sa 19 poena i Mekoluma koji je ubacio 18 poena.

VTB LIGA

NedeljaHimki - Uniks Kazanj 109:83




Foto: 
MN Press
text:
Himki recovered from the Star and scored 109 points to Unix
Alexei Shved found the old shooter form again

03 Nov 2019

Horribly, Khimki played last Thursday in Belgrade, scoring just 55 points in three quarters and receiving as many as 80, but this week he was able to make it into the big derby of the regional VTB league. The Russian capital hosted the Unix of Kazan, who was able to raise his hands from victory after the first quarter - 109: 83.
Desperate to play Unix on defense throughout the match, he scored at least 26 points in each quarter, which is disastrous for a team planning to contend for a Euroleague placement next season. The attack even worked quite well, except in the first quarter.
As early as the first quarter, Himki gradually began to build the advantage. These were not some excessively large series of points, but they were enough for the host to have as many as 13 points advantage at the end of the quarter. However, at the beginning of the second section, a complete collapse of the guests was seen.
Himki tied another 14 points, going for a whopping 27 points advantage and it was a way of no return for the Unix team, which, though by halftime, managed to reduce the disaster as it reduced the gap to 17 points - 57:40.
However, the beginning of the third quarter was mirrored. Himki again entered the excellent series, once again going to 27 points difference, and the advantage was successfully kept until the very end. The biggest difference in the scoreboard was seen in the middle of the last quarter, when there were 30 points between the two teams. Lastly, "decent" minus 26 for Unix - 109: 83.
It is important to point out that after the break due to injury, he again played Stefan Jovic, who in eight minutes spent on the field managed to score three points.
The most efficient at Khimki was Alexei Shved with 24 points, followed by Devin Booker with 21 points. On the other hand, Unix could only rely on Smith with 19 points and McAllum notching 18 points.

VTB LEAGUE

SundayHimki - Unix Penalty 109: 83
